newsitem.title: UK: Pakistan tenders to buy 50,000 t white sugar - trade.
newsitem.headline: Pakistan tenders to buy 50,000 t white sugar - trade.

text.p: Pakistan has issued a tender to buy a total 50,000 tonnes of white sugar in two equal shipments, trade sources said on Monday.
It would hold the first tender on July 31 and the second on August 15, they said. Details of the exact shipment periods have yet to emerge.
Last month, Pakistan was said to have bought one cargo of white sugar at $351 a tonne.
